Articles.Content:
Introducing the latest all-Kerbin car for your everyday needs!

The Kerbolet Shoshone (sho-sho-nee) concept is packed with features that make it incredible to drive and operate. Featuring four comfortable seats, large windows for visibility, and plenty of headroom for bulky spacesuits, the Kerbolet Shoshone brings compact power to your day! 

Powered by a combination of four electric motors, one on each wheel, and a full jet engine mounted in the rear, the Kerbolet Shoshone works just as well at 5 m/s as it does at 40 m/s. The Kerbolet Shoshone features optional 4-wheel steering and the ability to turn off either the front or rear wheels to conserve power. The Kerbolet Shoshone also features stylish solar collector panels to keep you on the road all day long!

Vehicle Specifications
Weight: 3.054t
Height: 1.6m
Width: 1.6m
Length: 4.0m

Top Speed: 50 m/s

Part Count: 91

Disclaimer: Tweakscale was used in the development of this vehicle.
I like it! I'm literally the worst at building cars, so anything looks like a masterpiece to me. This car goes beyond that though. Very stylish.
